title: Introduction to Physical AI: Where Intelligence Meets the Physical World
description: Physical AI, also known as Embodied AI, represents a paradigm shift from traditional digital-only AI systems to intelligent agents that interact with the physical world through a body. Unlike conventional AI that operates purely in the digital realm, Physical AI systems have a physical presence that allows them to perceive their environment through sensors and act upon it using actuators.

tags.label: Introduction
tags.description: Introduction to Physical AI and Human-Robot Interaction
